SEARCH
Module fr.cyu
Package fr.cyu.chromatynk.parsing

Class Lexer

java.lang.Object
fr.cyu.chromatynk.parsing.Lexer
public class Lexer extends Object
The lexer of Chromat'ynk. Transforms the source code in a sequence of tokens.

    • LITERAL_COLOR_PARSER

      public static final Parser<Character,Token.LiteralColor> LITERAL_COLOR_PARSER
      Parser for color literals (e.g #FFF, #AA0000, #FFFF...). Must have a length of 3, 4, 6 or 8 hexadecimal digits.

    • SYMBOL_PARSER

      public static final Parser<Character,Token> SYMBOL_PARSER
      Parser for all non-operator symbols.

    • KEYWORD_PARSER

      public static final Parser<Character,Token> KEYWORD_PARSER
      Parser for all alphabetic keywords.

    • IDENTIFIER_PARSER

      public static final Parser<Character,Token.Identifier> IDENTIFIER_PARSER
      Parser for any identifier. An identifier is alphanumeric and must start with an alphabetic character. It can also contain or/and start with underscores like _abc` or `abc_def.

    • TOKENS_PARSER

      public static final Parser<Character,List<Token>> TOKENS_PARSER
      The full parser converting a Character sequence input to a sequence of Token.
